channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs will take their toll on fresh fruit and vegetables — that’s bad news for low-income Americans
item.description: Call it the attack of the killer tomato tariffs.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Is the White House trying to engineer a recession? This Wall Street pro explains the vision.
item.description: Traders are starting to price in the possibility that the U.S. economy might enter recession— and one Wall Street veteran says that might actually be ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: I’m 69 and only have $121,000 in my 401(k). How can I repair the damage of the past?
item.description: “I plan to work and contribute to a 401(k) in addition to a stock-purchasing plan for a few more years.”

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: My husband gave his credit card to his son to pay for ‘medical bills.’ Does this kind of support send the wrong message?
item.description: “This young man has been enabled financially by both of his parents, but especially by his mom.”

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Here’s how much extra spending Germany is planning as bond yields see historic surge
